meanings.definition: The area visible from a specific location.
meanings.sent1: From the top of the hill, the viewsheds included the entire valley below.
meanings.sent2: The viewsheds from the lookout tower allowed us to see for miles.
meanings.sent3: The viewsheds from the treehouse made spying on the neighbors quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her viewsheds of the city were like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The viewsheds of the ocean at sunset were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The range of visibility from a particular vantage point.
meanings.sent1: The viewsheds from the lighthouse extended far out to sea.
meanings.sent2: The viewsheds from the mountaintop were obstructed by fog.
meanings.sent3: His viewsheds from the office window made him feel like a king surveying his kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The viewsheds of the stars in the clear night sky were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The viewsheds of the canyon were awe-inspiring.
